name: Falling Blocks
body:
### Welcome to Falling Blocks. This is a Tetris clone, created by @Thinic, because there are not many clones that allow two players to play with the same keyboard. You can download the latest file [here](https://github.com/Thinic/Falling-Blocks/blob/master/Tetris2P-latest.jar). The game requires Java 7 or higher as of 6 December 2015. ### Download To Download, click on link, and press View Raw.
[Latest](https://github.com/Thinic/Falling-Blocks/blob/master/Tetris2P-latest.jar)
[Version 0.2.1.6](https://github.com/Thinic/Falling-Blocks/blob/master/Tetris2P 0.2.1.6.jar)
### How to Play #### Solo Left - Left
Right - Right
Down - Down
Instant Down - Space
Rotate CW - Up, X
Rotate CCW - Z
#### Duel ##### Player 1 Left - A
Right - D
Down - S
Instant Down - Q
Rotate CW - W, X
Rotate CCW - Z
##### Player 2 Left - Left
Right - Right
Down - Down
Instant Down - End
Rotate CW - Up, Page Down
Rotate CCW - Delete
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
